name: The Inner Lakes
overview: Welcome to the Inner Lakes and the starting point of your quest to catch the Irish Record Tench. After a long, exhausting car journey, you have finally arrived. You will need insight, skill and determination to succeed... This is a fishing adventure game' although it sounds strange it should reportedly be very good. The action of the game is; You are a happy amateur fisherman' who will do anything to beat the record. By catching the biggest fish in Ireland's lakes and streams. You start outside your car' from here you can then walk towards the lake or stream. When you approach the lake, different people will come' these people will ask you to help them. A good starter text adventure with some nice puzzles to solve.
